top.title: Trump says progress made in Ukraine talks but 'thorny issues' remain
top.summary: Both the US president and Zelensky describe talks in Florida as "great" and "terrific" but the issue of territory remains "unresolved".

top.title: 'There are many challenges': Syrians in Turkey consider return after fall of Assad
top.summary: Syrians in Turkey are weighing up whether it is the right time to return to their homeland.

top.title: China holds military drills around Taiwan as warning to 'separatist forces'
top.summary: The drills come days after the US announced the sale of one of its largest weapons packages to Taiwan.

top.title: UK social media campaigners among five denied US visas
top.summary: The Trump administration bans five people who have called for tech regulation from entering the country.

top.title: TikTok removes AI weight loss ads from fake Boots account
top.summary: The adverts for prescription-only drugs showed healthcare professionals impersonating the British retailer.

top.title: Call of Duty co-creator Vince Zampella dies in California car crash
top.summary: The influential video game developer died after his car crashed and caught fire on a highway in Los Angeles.
